entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Baie-James
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:35 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: NW 29 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
